summary: WE HAVE CONTACTED CHRYSLER CORP. AND THE PHONE ATTENDANT SAID "WE WILL NOT COVER THIS".  LET ME SAY THAT LESS THAN 2 YEARS AGO, I RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE ON A DETERIORATION (PCV) HOSE ON THIS VEHICLE AND THEY (CHRYSLER) TOOK CARE OF THIS  AT A LOCAL DEALER.  IT SURE DOES SEEM TO ME THAT SAFETY BELTS ARE OF GREATER IMPORTANCE THAN A HOSE!!  WE HAVE SMALL CHILDREN AND CANNOT BUCKLE THEM IN!!!!
